title: The Coolest Places On Earth Series 1 15of22 Hiking 720p x264 AAC
description:
The Coolest Places on Earth: Series 1

Travel Documentary hosted by Rodger Leopardi, published by Bellum Films in 2015 - English narration 
http://docuwiki.net/images/e/e6/The-Coolest-Places-on-Earth-Series-1-Cover.jpg

Information
------------------------------

The Coolest Places on Earth 
The Coolest Places on Earth takes viewers on a journey of discovery to the most astonishing places on the planet - cities, festivals, landmarks and jaw-dropping works of nature - exploring each location's history and culture, to discover why it deserves to be called one of the coolest places on earth!



15)  Hiking 
Strap your boots and grab your pack because we're hiking some of the best and longest trails in the world. We're taking you from the icy tundra of Norway, to one of the driest place on Earth, all in search of the perfect place to gaze at the wonders of the night sky!

16)  Northern Europe 
We're heading to colder climes where we'll cross frosty fjords in Iceland, clash with mighty Vikings in Norway, and find out why there's nothing green in Greenland.

17)  Central Canada 
Get ready to see The Great White North like you've never seen it before. We're hiking, skiing, and snowmobiling our way across Eastern and Central Canada, checking out the best of what these regions have to offer.

18)  Western Canada 
In this episode we check out the wonders and wilds of Western Canada and the Territories, from the man-made heights of Vancouver skyscrapers to the majestic peaks of Banff National Park.

19)  Endurance Races 
Grab your running shoes, pump up your tires, and get ready to face some of the most intense endurance races on the planet! Coolest Places travels across the globe to find out what makes these competitions so tough and what makes these athletes crazy enough to compete.

20)  Tokyo Japan 
We travel across the globe to the capital of the Land of the Rising Sun - Tokyo, Japan. We'll dive into the city, check out the sights and figure out just what makes so many people want to live here, the most populous metropolitan area in the world.

21)  Aloha Hawaii 
The surf's up and the sun's out as we head to the Aloha State - Hawaii! Get ready to see the best sights of Hawaii's four biggest islands, from the gnarly waves of the North Shore to the beautiful jungles of Kauai, backdrop to dozens of Hollywood blockbusters. Hang ten!

22)  Best of Season 1 
On The Coolest Places on Earth: Get ready to experience some of the most memorable travel destinations in the world as we look back on the best of Season 1. From the bottom of the Great Barrier Reef to the top of the Empire State building, we'll take a look at what makes Earth so cool.
